topComments.author: Jessica Doyle
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Eu normalmente n√£o amo zool√≥gicos porque sou contra animais em cativeiro, mas este zool√≥gico parece ter um forte elemento de conserva√ß√£o com muitos programas em andamento para ajudar popula√ß√µes de animais em todo o mundo. O zool√≥gico oferece muitas √°reas sombreadas, √°gua e banheiros amplos, e √© configurado para que haja muito espa√ßo e espa√ßo para passear. Eu gostaria que eles oferecessem mais op√ß√µes veganas em sua pra√ßa de alimenta√ß√£o - definitivamente traga sua pr√≥pria comida se voc√™ for vegano. Algumas das exposi√ß√µes foram fechadas, o que foi decepcionante, mas ainda havia muito o que ver. Havia tamb√©m muitas exibi√ß√µes de animais Lego que eram realmente legais!  (Original) I don't love zoos normally because I'm against animals in captivity but this zoo appears to have a strong conservation element with many programs underway to help animal populations around the world.  The zoo offers lots of shaded areas, ample water and bathrooms, and is set up so that there's lots of room and space to walk around.  I wish they would offer more vegan choices in their food court - definitely bring your own food if you're vegan.  Some of the exhibits were closed which was disappointing but there was still lots to see.  There were also lots of Lego animal displays that were really neat!

topComments.author: Elizabeth Claunch
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O zool√≥gico de N√°poles √© lindo! √â perfeito para os pequenos porque n√£o √© muito grande, ent√£o voc√™ pode passar por ele rapidamente ou tomar seu tempo e circular algumas vezes verificando os animais. As girafas foram provavelmente o destaque para n√≥s, porque voc√™ pode alimentar as girafas se desejar pagar mais e tirar uma foto. Os le√µes tamb√©m foram espetaculares e as chitas. Meu pequenino era muito novo para o passeio de barco, mas essa √© uma √≥tima op√ß√£o para dar um passeio de barco para ver os macacos balan√ßando nas √°rvores. Definitivamente visite se voc√™ tiver uma ou duas horas de sobra enquanto visita N√°poles!  (Original) The Naples Zoo is beautiful! It‚Äôs perfect for little ones because it‚Äôs not very large so you can get through it pretty quickly or take your time and circle a couple times checking out the animals. The giraffes were probably the highlight for us because you can feed the giraffes if you wish to pay extra and get a picture taken. The Lions were also spectacular and the cheetahs. My little guy was too young for the boat ride but that‚Äôs a really nice option to take a boat ride around to see the monkeys swinging from the trees. Definitely visit if you have an hour or two to spare while visiting Naples!

topComments.author: Katherine Perry
topComments.comment: Arrived about 2:30 and we had it mostly to ourselves other than a couple other families. Rather hot but plenty of covered paths and shade and there are water fountains at multiple places. Wonderful animals to see and honestly even more beautiful landscaping. So many cool trees and plants. Loved it.

topComments.author: Odalis Torres
topComments.comment: So fun! Awesome place to go with family and they have lots of attractions! Go on a slightly cooler day since the animals mostly all have fur and will kind of just sit around. I recommend the honey badger exhibit! They move around a ton and are fun to watch!

topComments.author: Karen Ssessanga
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Desconto Militar $ 5 de desconto! Pequeno zool√≥gico, mas tem girafa alimentando US $ 5 por 3 folhas de alface e passeio de barco gratuito para ver macacos em sua ilha üèù habitat com conversa hist√≥rica e zool√≥gica informativa do capit√£o do barco ... fot√≥grafos ao redor do zool√≥gico tirando fotos por custos ... lanches s√£o zool√≥gico pre√ßos!! N√£o h√° √°reas com ar condicionado para comer, mas muitas mesas de piquenique na sombra ... traga seu pr√≥prio piquenique incentivado ... 2 horas muito agrad√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãgastas para vermos metade do zool√≥gico ...  (Original) Military Discount $5 off! Small zoo but has Giraffe feeding $5 for 3 lettuce leaves and free pontoon boat ride to see monkeys on their island üèù  habitat with informative historical and zoological talk by boat captain...photographers around the zoo taking pics for costs...snacks are zoo prices!! No air conditioned areas to eat but lots of picnic tables in shade...bring your own picnic encouraged...very nice 2hrs spent for us to see half the zoo...

topComments.author: Mary Flores-Camacho
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Passei uma manh√£ deliciosa no zool√≥gico com meu filho e sua fam√≠lia. Nossa primeira parada foi o cruzeiro de expedi√ß√£o Primata. Voc√™ passa cerca de 20 minutos observando os primatas em uma variedade de pequenas ilhas enquanto eles vagam livremente. Nosso capit√£o foi engra√ßado e deu fatos sobre os primatas. Depois, pagamos US$ 5 para nossa neta alimentar uma girafa. Ela adorou isso. Em seguida, vimos um show no Safari Canyon Sentado Safari. O tratador do zool√≥gico MC apresenta diferentes tipos de animais que s√£o trazidos por outro tratador do zool√≥gico. Eles mostram pequenos clipes sobre os animais. Achei a tela muito pequena para realmente apreciar e n√£o prendeu o interesse das crian√ßas. Al√©m disso, o show poderia fazer com animais mais interessantes. Uma tartaruga √© comum e minhas netas de 3 e 7 anos n√£o ficaram impressionadas. No entanto, eu amei o hornbill. Existe um parque infantil com aparelhos que as crian√ßas podem desfrutar. Foi decepcionante que o raro tigre teve que ser morto. O zool√≥gico pode ser visto em cerca de 2 horas, o que √© bom, pois voc√™ n√£o est√° fritando no sol. Eu recomendaria este zool√≥gico.  (Original) I spent a delightful morning at the zoo with my son and his family. Our first stop was the Primate expedition cruise. You spend about 20 minutes watching the primates on a variety of small islands as they roam freely. Our captain was funny and gave facts about the primates. Afterwards, we paid $5 for our granddaughter to feed a giraffe. She loved that.  We then saw a show at the Safari Canyon Seated Safari. The zoo keeper MC introduces different types of animals which are brought out by another zoo keeper. They show little clips about the animals. I found the screen to be too small to really appreciate and did not keep the interest of the kids. Also, the show could do with more interesting animals. A turtle is common and my 3 and 7 year old granddaughters were not impressed. However, I did love the hornbill. There is a playground with apparatus that children can enjoy. It was disappointing that the rare tiger had to be killed. The zoo can be seen in about 2 hours which is good since you're not frying in the sun. I would recommend this zoo.

topComments.author: Tiffany Smith
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um zool√≥gico t√£o incr√≠vel! A equipe foi muito simp√°tica e o ambiente era tranquilo e agrad√°vel. A folhagem √© t√£o fascinante, pois anteriormente era um jardim bot√¢nico. Voc√™ ver√° muitas √°rvores tropicais enormes e plantas √∫nicas. Parece que voc√™ est√° andando por uma selva. As exposi√ß√µes de animais s√£o grandes e os animais s√£o confort√°veis ‚Äã‚Äãe claramente tratados bem e com respeito. eu recomendo  (Original) Such an amazing zoo! The staff was very friendly and the environment was quiet and enjoyable. The foliage is so fascinating since it was previously a botanical garden. You‚Äôll see a lot of huge tropical trees and unique plants. It feels like you‚Äôre walking through a jungle. The animal exhibits are big and the animals are comfy and clearly treated well and with respect. I highly recommend

topComments.author: Steven Prida
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Zool√≥gico legal, a maioria das trilhas s√£o cercadas por √°rvores que oferecem muita sombra. Boa variedade de exposi√ß√µes de animais. Oferece uma das exposi√ß√µes de girafas mais legais, onde voc√™ pode aliment√°-las e obter √≥timas fotos de perto. O passeio de barco pela ilha de macacos / macacos √© imperd√≠vel. Esteja ciente de que voc√™ provavelmente poder√° completar o zool√≥gico inteiro em menos de uma hora. Os banheiros foram mantidos limpos, bem como os caminhos e √°reas externas. A equipe foi educada e informativa sobre os diferentes animais tamb√©m.  (Original) Nice zoo, most of the walk ways are surrounded by trees that proved plenty of shade. Good variety of animal exhibits. Provides one of coolest giraffe exhibits where you can feed them and get some great up close pictures. The monkey/ape island boat tour is a must. Just be aware you can likely complete the entire zoo in under an hour or so. The rest rooms were kept clean as well as the paths and outdoor areas. Staff was polite and informative about the different animals as well.

topComments.author: Sachi K
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um zool√≥gico pequeno, mas com certeza ser√° um passeio de um dia longo com toda a folhagem e o interessante passeio de barco que o zool√≥gico tem a oferecer. A fam√≠lia veio durante a constru√ß√£o, mas voltaremos para ver quais novas adi√ß√µes o zool√≥gico de N√°poles oferecer√° na pr√≥xima vez.  (Original) It‚Äôs a small zoo, but it will definitely be a longish day trip with all the foliage and the interesting boat tour the zoo has to offer. The family came during construction, but we will be back to see what new additions the Naples Zoo will offer next time.

topComments.author: J.M. Wagner
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um √≥timo lugar para um encontro! Lugar maravilhoso para passar a tarde. N√≥s nos divertimos muito explorando e aprendendo sobre os animais. Me senti como uma crian√ßa de novo! Os shows e exibi√ß√µes educacionais dos animais eram t√£o interessantes e n√£o era muito andar tamb√©m. Tamb√©m adorei como eles compartilharam todas as maneiras como mant√™m os animais o mais pr√≥ximo poss√≠vel de sua vida cotidiana na selva, para n√£o puni-los no que vemos como cativeiro. Eles tinham os melhores pretzels suaves (e eu sou de Philly!) E tamb√©m uma verdadeira salada de quinua saud√°vel que estava cheia de bondade! Eu definitivamente estarei de volta em breve e talvez at√© mesmo para uma associa√ß√£o anual !!!  (Original) Such a great place for a date! Wonderful place to spend the afternoon. We had so much fun exploring and learning about the animals. I felt like a kid all over again! The shows and educational exhibits of the animals were so interesting and it wasn't too much walking either. I also loved how they shared all the ways they keep the animals as close to their everyday life in the wild as to not punish them in what we see as captivity. They had the best soft pretzels (and I'm from Philly!) and also a real healthy quinoa salad that was packed with goodness! I will definitely be back real soon and maybe even for an annual membership!!!

topComments.author: Kristin Kerrigan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) J√° faz um bom tempo desde a √∫ltima vez que estive aqui e fiquei agradavelmente surpreso com o quanto realmente gostei do zool√≥gico! √â do tamanho certo com a quantidade certa de exposi√ß√µes para ver.  Ansioso para voltar na pr√≥xima vez que estou na cidade!  (Original) It's been quite a while since I was last here & I was pleasantly surprised by how much I really enjoyed the zoo! It's just the right size with just the right amount of exhibits to see.  Looking forward to going back the next time I am in town!

topComments.author: Taylor Bujouves
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este zool√≥gico √© provavelmente um dos meus favoritos de todos os tempos. A folhagem dentro do zool√≥gico √© impressionante por si s√≥. Muitos dos animais t√™m espa√ßo adequado em seus recintos. Vi quase todos os animais, o que geralmente n√£o acontece quando vou a zool√≥gicos. Eles geralmente est√£o escondidos.  No entanto, n√£o conseguimos ver Monkey Island, pois havia muitas pessoas na fila. Eles precisam de outro barco ou algo assim.  Muito triste com Eko. Meu cora√ß√£o est√° com todos os funcion√°rios e os envolvidos.  Eu recomendo este zool√≥gico para quem pensa em ir!  (Original) This zoo is probably one of my all time favorites. The foliage within the zoo is impressive in itself. Many of the animals have adequate room in their enclosures. I saw almost all the animals, which usually doesn‚Äôt happen when I go to zoos. They‚Äôre usually hiding.  However we didn‚Äôt get to see Monkey Island as there was soo many people in line. They need another boat or something.  Very sad about Eko. My heart goes out to all the employees & those involved.  I recommend this zoo for anyone thinking about going!

topComments.author: Nadia Morozova
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Vi texugo de mel, le√£o mt (= puma), tamandu√°-bandeira e outros grandes animais. Visitou alimenta√ß√£o/treinamento de jacar√©s. Eu vi o show sentado onde a equipe mostrou alguns animais e descrevi como eles treinam os animais. Tamb√©m fiz um passeio de barco para Monkey Island (inclu√≠do no ingresso). Altamente recomendado!  (Original) Saw honey badger, mt lion (=puma), giant anteater and other great animals. Visited feeding/training of gators. I saw the sitted show where staff showed few animals and described how they train the animals. I also took a boat tour to Monkey Island (included in the ticket). Highly recommend!
